# 1991 President's Cup International Football Tournament

Ha Seok-ju
| player =  Ha Seok-ju
| prevseason = 1989
| nextseason = 1993
}}
The '''1993 President's Cup International Football Tournament () was the 19th competition of Korea Cup. It was held from 7 to 16 June 1993.
